qas.question: The right to create ordynacja's was important to what group?
When did the right to create ordynacja's happen?
What did the right to create ordynacja's entail?

answers.text: ensured that a family which gained wealth and power could more easily preserve this

qas.question: What did the powerful families do with the kings estates?
What was an important power basis for the magnates?

context: One of the most important victories of the <a0_0>magnates<a0_0/> was the <a1_0>late 16th century<a1_0/> right to create ordynacja's (similar to majorats), which <a2_0>ensured that a family which gained wealth and power could more easily preserve this<a2_0/>. Ordynacje's of families of Radziwiłł, Zamoyski, Potocki or Lubomirski <a3_0>often rivalled<a3_0/> the <a4_0>estates of the king<a4_0/> and were important power bases for the magnates.
